content: this is a seed stitch headband seamed with a twist it is written to fit an average adult head however instructions are included to adjust to your needs this pattern was designed using roughly 70 yards of lion brand hue + me bulky weight and 10 5mm with a gauge of 12 stitches and 21 row in a 4 x4 sqaure with final measurements before seaming of 4 5 wide and 21 5 long
